parameters.name: CycleTime
parameters.description:
The day of the cycle.

- If CycleType is set to Month, enter a number from 1 to 28 to specify the day of the month. Use a comma (,) to separate multiple days.

- If CycleType is set to Week, enter a number from 1 to 7 to specify the day of the week. Use a comma (,) to separate multiple days.

parameters.name: CycleType
parameters.description:
The cycle type.

- Month: monthly

- Week: weekly

parameters.name: MaintainEndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the O\&M window for the instance. The time is in the HH:mmZ format and is in UTC.

parameters.name: MaintainStartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the O\&M window for the instance. The time is in the HH:mmZ format and is in UTC.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the configuration is enabled.

- 1: enabled

- 2: disabled
